DOC.brief_summary: This project aim investigate efficacy two model treat Posttraumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) Cambodian refugee primary care . The first step model give medication , serotonin reuptake inhibitor/serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI/SSRN ) , paroxetine first-line agent . For patient still PTSD , second step either another medication culturally sensitive cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) . The investigator hypothesize patient improve model , CBT model .
DOC.brief_title: Two Stepped Care Models Posttraumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) Among Cambodian Refugees With PTSD
DOC.detailed_description: This project aim investigate efficacy two model treat PTSD Cambodian refugees primary care . The first step model give medication ( SSRI/SSRN , e.g. , paroxetine ) . For still PTSD , second step either add another medication ( e.g. , prazosin ) provide culturally sensitive cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) . We hypothesize patient improve model , CBT model . The primary outcome measure PTSD severity assess PTSD Checklist ( PCL ) . Eligibility requirement include PTSD old enough remember Khmer Rouge period .
DOC.criteria: PTSD ; PCL great equal 44 ; Survivor Cambodian genocide ; At least 7 year old time Cambodian genocide Pregnant ; Active suicidality ; Mental retardation ; Organic mental disorder ; Bipolar disorder ; Alcohol dependence ; Marijuana dependence ; Unable give conform consent
